messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Davinci. May I know your name, please?
It's Chloe. Look, I'm really frustrated right now.
I'm sorry to hear that, Chloe. How can I assist you today?
I need to talk about a payment issue. I bought Maggi Soy Sauce, and the payment went through twice. This is ridiculous!
I apologize for the inconvenience, Chloe. Let me look into this for you. Could you please provide me with your order number?
The order number is 123456. I can't believe I have to deal with this. Why can't things just work?
I understand your frustration, Chloe. I see the duplicate charge here. I will initiate the refund process for the extra payment immediately.
How long will it take to get my money back? This whole thing is just wasting my time.
The refund process typically takes 3-5 business days. I assure you, I'll expedite it as much as possible.
Fine. Just make sure it gets done quickly. I don't want to deal with this again.
Absolutely, Chloe. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, just fix this mess. Thanks.
We will get this sorted as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience, Chloe.
